You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesE E] > &eng;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&ENG;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/014a/index.htm U+0014A].
  * `&eng;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/014b/index.htm U+0014B].
